template.description: Test Control DB Example 5 : Create A View & Transform Data
template.name: DB_Example_5_Transform

processGroups.comments: Test Control DB Example 5 : Create A View & Transform Data

entry.value: create view dbt_coffee_shop.customers_orders as with first_trans as ( select customers.id as id, customers.first_name as first_name, customers.last_name as last_name, customers.first_order_date as first_order_date, customers.number_of_orders as orders from DataTeam_test.dbt_coffee_shop.customers where first_order_date is not null ), second_trans as ( select id, first_name, last_name, year(first_order_date) as order_year, month(first_order_date) as order_month, day(first_order_date) as order_day, orders from first_trans ) -- create view customers_orders as select * from second_trans;

processGroups.name: DB Example 5 : Transform
